title: Test Selection Rules
description: Configuration for test selection based on changed paths

ignorePaths.description: Glob patterns for files that should be completely ignored (no test triggers, no fallback)

projectMappings.description: Convention-based mappings for automatic test project discovery

categories.description: Test categories with their trigger rules

projectMapping.description: Maps source paths to test projects using pattern substitution

sourcePattern.description: Glob pattern with {name} placeholder for source files

testPattern.description: Pattern with {name} placeholder for test project path

exclude.description: Glob patterns for paths to exclude from this mapping

triggerAll.description: If any path matches, set run_all=true and run everything

runByDefault.description: Category runs whenever tests run (unless excluded)

triggerPaths.description: Glob patterns - if any match, category is triggered

excludePaths.description: Glob patterns - matching files are excluded from triggering this category

excludeWhenOnly.description: Skip this category if changes are ONLY in listed categories

alsoTriggers.description: If this category triggers, also enable these categories

useConvention.description: Auto-map source paths to test projects via conventions

projects.description: Explicit list of test projects for this category
